LanguageData.SRV_Forge.label: forge
LanguageData.SRV_Forge.description: An ancient structure used for heating up metal and working it into useful tools.
LanguageData.SRV_Grill.label: grill
LanguageData.SRV_Grill.description: A small grill used to cook food. Requires fuel to cook.
LanguageData.SRV_TableCamp.label: camp crafting table
LanguageData.SRV_TableCamp.description: A lightweight collapsible table for doing simple tasks while traveling.
